issue.title: [C++] Array subclass constructors must set ArrayData::null_count to 0 when there is no validity bitmap
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8863](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8863). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Many type-specific array constructors incorrectly set the null count to unknown. It would be better to set it to 0
